name: Fast Attack Craft
abilities: Fast Attack Craft can only attack once per turn

name: Inteprlanetary Missile
abilities: Interplanetary Missile may :burn: the same turn it is constructed. Interplanetary Missile may bombard the asset it is orbiting without spending any delta-vee. Destroy Interplanetary Missile at the end of this turn.

name: Colony Ship
abilities: Colony ship may contribute 4 :construction: to the asset it is orbiting, if it does Colony Ship is destroyed and does not create a debris field.
